This specification defines the hierarchy of the Application modules.

Summary of Methods

InterfaceMethod
ApplicationObject
Application

Introduction

The Application modules are :
  • navigation
Access to the modules is provided through the interfaces :
  • motor.application.navigation

Interfaces

ApplicationObject

Defines what is instantiated in the motor object.
There will be a motor.application object that allows accessing the functionality of the application module.
readonly attribute Application application

Application

Application interface.
The submodules of Application (bluetooth and navigation) define the names and the features to be requested for being instantiated.
